item.description: The cheat sheet below shows most important characteristics of Javascript. ğŸ”¹ Interpreted Language JavaScript code is executed by the browser or JavaScript engine rather than being compiled into machine language beforehand. This makes it highly portable across different platforms. Modern engines such as V8 utilize Just-In-Time (JIT) technology to compile code into directly executable machine code. ğŸ”¹ Function is First-Class Citizen In JavaScript, functions are treated as first-class citizens, meaning they can be stored in variables, passed as arguments to other functions, and returned from functions.
